snippet.title: Cold Abyss | The Mix Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3260040/Cold_Abyss_Directors_Cut/

COLD ABYSS is a relaxing and atmospheric exploration game set on the bottom of the ocean. Your objective is simple: repair all broken network cables.

Whether it’s peace you’re looking for, or something else...

The dark depths of the ocean are the perfect place to unwind after a long day.
